tldr: The module does not filter administrator-entered text, resulting in a persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. Exploitation is limited because an attacker must have a role with the permission `administer responsive favicons`.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `drupal/responsive_favicons` library to the patch version.
